channel.title: GitHub Solidity Monthly Trending
channel.description: Monthly Trending of Solidity in GitHub

item.title: OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts
item.description: OpenZeppelin Contracts is a library for secure smart contract development.

item.title: AmazingAng/WTF-Solidity
item.description: WTF Solidity 极简入门教程，供小白们使用。Now supports English! 官网: https://wtf.academy

item.title: foundry-rs/forge-std
item.description: A collection of helpful contracts and libraries for use with Forge and Foundry

item.title: Dapp-Learning-DAO/Dapp-Learning
item.description: Dapp learning project for developers at all stages. Becoming and cultivating sovereign individuals. Nonprofit organization.

item.title: dapphub/ds-test
item.description: Assertions, equality checks and other test helpers

item.title: transmissions11/solmate
item.description: Modern, opinionated, and gas optimized building blocks for smart contract development.

item.title: dmfxyz/murky
item.description: Merkle Proof Generator and Validator in Solidity

item.title: Uniswap/v2-periphery
item.description: 🎚 Peripheral smart contracts for interacting with Uniswap V2

item.title: succinctlabs/sp1-contracts
item.description: Smart contracts for onchain verification of SP1.
